items.content: United States Attorney General Pam Bondi praised the US Supreme Court for "correctly" overturning a lower court's order that blocked Texas' new Republican-favored congressional map for the 2026 midter...

items.title: US Supreme Court allows Texas to use redrawn voting maps in midterms
items.standfirst: The electoral map could boost the Republican effort to shore up their majority in the coming 2026 midterm elections.
items.content: The electoral map could boost the Republican effort to shore up their majority in the coming 2026 midterm elections.

items.title: US Supreme Court allows Texas to use redrawn district map for 2026 midterms
items.standfirst: The new Texas map, backed by Donald Trump, has sparked similar efforts for partisan redistricting across the US.
items.content: The new Texas map, backed by Donald Trump, has sparked similar efforts for partisan redistricting across the US.

items.title: US supreme court approves redrawn Texas congressional maps
items.standfirst: Major win for Trump as majority rejects lower-court ruling that found maps had been racially gerrymanderedTexas can use a redrawn congressional map that adds as many as five Republican-friendly congressional districts, the supreme court ruled on Thursday, handing Donald Trump a major win in his push to boost Republican seats ahead of next year’s midterm elections.In an unsigned order, the 6-3 conservative majority court granted a request by Texas to lift a lower court’s ruling that struck down the state’s new map in November. The supreme court’s three liberal justices dissented. Continue reading...
items.content: Major win for Trump as majority rejects lower-court ruling that found maps had been racially gerrymanderedTexas can use a redrawn congressional map that adds as many as five Republican-friendly congressional districts, the supreme court ruled on Thursday, handing Donald Trump a major win in his push to boost Republican seats ahead of next year’s midterm elections.In an unsigned order, the 6-3 conservative majority court granted a request by Texas to lift a lower court’s ruling that struck down the state’s new map in November. The supreme court’s three liberal justices dissented. Continue reading...

items.title: US Supreme Court approves Texas's Republican-friendly electoral map
items.standfirst: The US Supreme Court on Thursday allowed Texas to use its newly redrawn congressional districts for the 2026 midterms, a major win for President Donald Trump’s Republicans that could reshape the battle for control of the House and accelerate a wave of politically charged redistricting across the country.
items.content: The US Supreme Court on Thursday allowed Texas to use its newly redrawn congressional districts for the 2026 midterms, a major win for President Donald Trump’s Republicans that could reshape the battle for control of the House and accelerate a wave of politically charged redistricting across the country.

items.title: Supreme Court allows Texas GOP to use new redistricted map for now
items.standfirst: Texas approved a new congressional map this summer after Trump urged state GOP lawmakers to craft new House district lines to help Republicans hold onto their majority in the 2026 midterms.
items.content: Texas approved a new congressional map this summer after Trump urged state GOP lawmakers to craft new House district lines to help Republicans hold onto their majority in the 2026 midterms.

items.title: Supreme Court lets Texas use gerrymandered map that could give GOP 5 more House seats
items.standfirst: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for a Texas congressional map that may help the GOP win five more U.S. House seats in the 2026 midterms. A lower court found the map is likely unconstitutional.
items.content: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for a Texas congressional map that may help the GOP win five more U.S. House seats in the 2026 midterms. A lower court found the map is likely unconstitutional.(Image credit: Eric Gay)

ai_summary: The Supreme Court overturned a lower court's ruling on Texas's congressional map.
The new map could benefit Republicans in the upcoming 2026 midterm elections.
The court's conservative majority granted Texas's request to use the map.
The three liberal justices on the court dissented from the decision.
The ruling is seen as a major win for Donald Trump and the GOP.

items.content: The bombs were placed the night before the 6 January riots, and were discovered as rioters began to storm the Capitol.

items.content: The 30-year-old Virginia resident evaded capture for years after authorities discovered pipe bombs planted near buildings in Washington, DC, the day before the January 6, 2021, Capitol attack.

items.content: The arrest of a Virginia man potentially ends a five-year mystery that highlighted rise of political violence in the US.

The arrest potentially ends a five-year mystery surrounding the case.

clusters.title: Four countries to boycott Eurovision 2026 as Israel cleared to compete
clusters.neutral_headline: Several Countries Boycott Eurovision Over Israel

items.title: Four countries to boycott Eurovision 2026 as Israel cleared to compete
items.standfirst: Ireland, Spain, Slovenia and the Netherlands pull out after decision not to hold vote on Israel’s participationIreland, Spain, Slovenia and the Netherlands will boycott next year’s Eurovision after Israel was given the all-clear to compete in the 2026 song contest despite calls by several participating broadcasters for its exclusion over the war in Gaza.No vote on Israel’s participation was held on Thursday at the general assembly of the European Broadcasting Union (EBU), the body that organises the competition. Continue reading...
items.content: Ireland, Spain, Slovenia and the Netherlands pull out after decision not to hold vote on Israel’s participationIreland, Spain, Slovenia and the Netherlands will boycott next year’s Eurovision after Israel was given the all-clear to compete in the 2026 song contest despite calls by several participating broadcasters for its exclusion over the war in Gaza.No vote on Israel’s participation was held on Thursday at the general assembly of the European Broadcasting Union (EBU), the body that organises the competition. Continue reading...

clusters.title: Russia continues tech crackdown by blocking Snapchat, FaceTime access
clusters.neutral_headline: Russia Blocks Snapchat and Restricts FaceTime Access

items.title: Russia continues tech crackdown by blocking Snapchat, FaceTime access
items.standfirst: Russian internet regulator Roskomnadzor accused both platforms of being used 'to organise and carry out terrorist acts'.
items.content: Russian internet regulator Roskomnadzor accused both platforms of being used 'to organise and carry out terrorist acts'.

items.title: Russia blocks Snapchat and restricts Apple’s FaceTime, state officials say
items.standfirst: Latest effort to control communications comes as regulator claims apps being used to ‘conduct terrorist activities’Russian authorities blocked access to Snapchat and imposed restrictions on Apple’s video calling service, FaceTime, the latest step in an effort to tighten control over the internet and communications online, according to state-run news agencies and the country’s communications regulator.The state internet regulator Roskomnadzor alleged in a statement that both apps were being “used to organize and conduct terrorist activities on the territory of the country, to recruit perpetrators [and] commit fraud and other crimes against our citizens”. Apple did not respond to an emailed request for comment, nor did Snap Inc. Continue reading...
items.content: Latest effort to control communications comes as regulator claims apps being used to ‘conduct terrorist activities’Russian authorities blocked access to Snapchat and imposed restrictions on Apple’s video calling service, FaceTime, the latest step in an effort to tighten control over the internet and communications online, according to state-run news agencies and the country’s communications regulator.The state internet regulator Roskomnadzor alleged in a statement that both apps were being “used to organize and conduct terrorist activities on the territory of the country, to recruit perpetrators [and] commit fraud and other crimes against our citizens”. Apple did not respond to an emailed request for comment, nor did Snap Inc. Continue reading...

ai_summary: Russia's internet regulator blocked Snapchat and restricted FaceTime access.
The regulator accused the platforms of facilitating terrorist activities.
The actions are part of Russia's efforts to control online communications.
The Russian government is tightening its grip on internet access.
Apple and Snap Inc. did not immediately respond to requests for comment.

items.standfirst: A Fabergé pendant has been recovered - after police spent six days closely monitoring the man accused of swallowing it.
items.content: A Fabergé pendant has been recovered - after police spent six days closely monitoring the man accused of swallowing it.

items.title: Patient police say they have recovered Fabergé pendant from man accused of swallowing it
items.standfirst: Six days after alleged incident, evidence emerges without requiring medical intervention, New Zealand police sayPolice say they have recovered a Fabergé egg pendant from a man accused of swallowing the item in a jewellery story.New Zealand police have spent six days monitoring every bowel movement of the suspect, a spokesperson said, and the NZ$33,000 ($19,000) James Bond Octopussy pendant was recovered from his gastrointestinal tract on Thursday night by natural means, without requiring medical intervention. Continue reading...

Continue reading...
